channel.title: Posts on Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Musings

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Welcome to my new blog. I’ve been meaning to set this up for quite a while now, but never really got around to it. I was finally given some incentive when I started a class called Hackers in the Bazaar, which required a blog to post responses to class readings (those responses can be found here). That said, I hope to use this blog for much more than just assigned posts.
